equipment.itemName: Visit of the Shining Butterfly Platinum [80Lv]

options.explain:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects.
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.
options.explainDetail:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects. (Cooldown: 300 sec.)
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.

options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on your highest Abnormal Status Tolerance.
- 10% to less than 18%: Damage Value +4756
- More than 18%: Damage Value +5311

Attacking Shocks or Poisons enemies for 20 sec.
Attacking Shocked enemies restore MP +8% over 16 sec.
Attacking Poisoned enemies restore MP +4% over 8 sec.
Immobility Tolerance +10%
Curse Tolerance +10%
Slow Tolerance +10%
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following, depending on your highest Abnormal Status Tolerance.
- 10% to less than 18%: Damage Value +4756
- More than 18%: Damage Value +5311

Attacking Shocks or Poisons enemies for 20 sec. (Cooldown: 5 sec.)
Attacking Shocked enemies restore MP +8% over 16 sec. (Cooldown: 15 sec.)
Attacking Poisoned enemies restore MP +4% over 8 sec. (Cooldown: 7 sec.)

options.explain:
Lv. 35 skills increase Lv. 35 skills' cooldown recovery +10% when cast.
- Lv. 35 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Interference skills

Lv. 70 skills increase Lv. 70 skills' cooldown recovery +10% when cast.
- Lv. 70 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Reenactment skills

- Creator: Effect only applied to the Reenactment skills

options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Evasion +2% and Physical/Magical Critical +2.5% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Evasion +2% and Physical/Magical Critical +2.5% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px (Cooldown: 3 sec. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
